channel.title: Suggestion command on a rsps 317 delta

item.title: Suggestion command on a rsps 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @kalson744 kalson744
item.description:
@kalson744 wrote:

go to ur source folder add txt file rename it to suggestions.txt
and add this in ur client.java

} if(command.startsWith("suggest")) { sendMessage("Sending..."); sendMessage("Suggestion Succesfully Sent To I weed I!"); BufferedWriter bw = null; String suggestion = command.substring(8); try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("suggestions.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+": "+suggestion); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error Suggesting"); } } }
if u got errors change
sendMessage
with sm or Sm or sM

item.title: Suggestion command on a rsps 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“suggestion”)) {
sM(“Your suggestion succesfully sent!”);
BufferedWriter bw = null;
String suggestion = command.substring(11);

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("../Data/Suggestions.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + ": " + suggestion);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sM("Error Suggesting");
                }[/code]

item.title: Suggestion command on a rsps 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

im trying to work on a suggestion command, what it does when you type
::suggestion
anything after suggestion will be sent to a file in config
ex:
::suggestion at falador there is an error in the castle…

it will send playername and message to that file so it will be like

smith at falador there is an error in the castle…

but it doesn’t work, here is my command

[code] if

(command.startsWith(“suggestion”) &&

playerRights >= 0) {
try {
String otherPName =

command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex =

PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex !=

-1) {
client p =

(client)

server.playerHandler.players[otherPInde

x];

writeLog(p.playerName, “suggestion”);
p.disconnected

= true;
sM("You have

submitted a suggestion.");
} else {
sM("Error,

please try again.");
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM("Try entering a

message");
}
}[/code]

thanks, i keep getting the error message part, and nothing shows up in the file. btw the file is in config. thanks
